comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. The table data editor is displayed. 
2. The cell is selected.
3. The [ ] button on the right side is clicked. 
4. The [CIDR Cell Editor] dialog is displayed.
5. .log is generated.

More information:
java.io.File.separator is used.

/org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.data.ui/src/org/eclipse/datatools/sqltools/data/internal/ui/DataUIPlugin.java
  public ImageDescriptor getPngImageDescriptor(String key)

The exception is the following.

Created an attachment (id=79996)
patch for the fix

Brian,

I added a patch to fix the exception

I applied Quy's patch to the DTP 1.5.2 stream (R1.5 folder in CVS) and the DTP 1.6 stream (main HEAD in CVS).  The bundle-versions are set to 1.0.1.200711091 and 1.1.0.200711091 respectively.

The fix is to use an IPath.append to construct a URL rather than using string concatenation of a java.io.File.separator constant.  The fix is in the getImageDescriptor and getPngImageDescriptor methods in the DataUIPlugin class in the org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.data.ui plugin.
